attributes.action: Stop the 5G rollout until independent testing proves it universally safe
attributes.additional_details: To provide an independent peer-reviewed, unbiased evidence base on the health consequences from long-term exposure for humans, wildlife or the natural environment. The government must stop this rollout until the long-term effects have been assessed for humans, and all fauna and flora.
attributes.background: For the government to stop the use and rollout of all 5G technology and the 5G radio wave spectrum until independent peer-reviewed long-termed research has been conducted that assures it is safe to humans, wildlife and environmental health.
